content: Hi compiler folks. Is this a good place to come to highlight a rustc bug? I filed an issue for it a while ago, but nothing happened with it. If it's just making its way through the queue, then no worries. Just wanted to make sure it hadn't been forgot about since it's blocking a minor feature in Fuchsia's Rust netstack. Here's the issue: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/54822
Yeah, we’ve been busy with 2018 lately… you might get more attention if it was a regression, but it appears to not be
note that we often might overlook a compiler bug if its not tagged with T-compiler. I'll add that label now
